thread.title: Will Smith to perform at Latin Grammys with Colombian band
thread.title_full: Will Smith to perform at Latin Grammys with Colombian band

title: Will Smith to perform at Latin Grammys with Colombian band
text:
> Entertainment Will Smith to perform at Latin Grammys with Colombian band FILE - In this Feb. 24, 2015 file photo, Will Smith arrives at the world premiere of "Focus" in Los Angeles. Smith will join the Colombian band Bomba Estereo for their remix of “Fiesta” in Las Vegas at the Latin Grammy Awards on Nov. 19. (Photo by John Salangsang/Invision/AP, FIle)
